data.message: Any man or woman serving in the  Branches of services SHOULD make more $$ than any elected office especially Congress in MY opinion and would if I had a say in it ! :) Thank you all !  Some Gave Some gave all ....... May God Bless your Family's and watch over your Sons and Daughters ......

replies.message: i disagree, i believe we should get a more fair treatment when were out through the VA and reasonable pay when you're still in. But i dont want people serving because of the money, i want to serve with people who want to be there with you not there for a nice check.
Connie Gilpin There are only 3. Department of Army, Navy and Air Force. Marines fall under Navy and the coast guard is now under department of Homeland Security
Well the joint has free college and all so get crackin'
There are 7 uniformed services, and 5 of those are the armed services.
God Bless all our Service branches

Mr Roger though I personally am A Navy special warfare ops  veteran may I remind you there are five branches of the military the US coast guard whom in time of warfare becomes department of the Navy just as the US Marines are a branch of the navy just a reminder and sending out some respect to those who gaurd our shores
Ok , 5 Branches 6 if ya count us Patriots! :)
Tom Edwards and by the “joint” I assume you’re talking about prison...?
